Texts.Eng:
Saturnians are moth wizards from the far away, sky city Solalei. These light worshiping moths have long studied techniques for making light manipulating wands and weapons.
    
 Diet: Herbivore
  
 ^orange;Perks^reset;:
 +^green;10^reset;% Energy
 +^green;15^reset;% Jump Boost
 Resist: ^green;15^reset;% Shadow and Cosmic
 Tech: ^green;Saturnian Flight^reset;
 
 ^orange;Environment^reset;:
 On ^green;Lush, Forest, Primeval and Rainforest^reset; biomes you gain +^green;25^reset;% energy.
  
 ^orange;Weapons^reset;:
 Wand/Staff: +^green;20^reset;% protection
 Staff: +^green;15^reset;% Damage, +^green;20^reset;% Energy
 Wand: +^green;10^reset;% Damage, +^green;5^reset;% Energy
    
 ^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
 -^red;25^reset;% Health, 
 Weak: ^red;35^reset;% Fire, ^red;20^reset;% Poison, ^red;15^reset;% Physical
